basic.name: Chain Heal (Q)
basic.description: Heal an ally with a wave of healing for 260 Health. The wave then bounces 2 times to nearby allies within 7 range, restoring 260 Health to them.

basic.name: Lightning Shield (W)
basic.description: Imbue an ally with lightning dealing 64 damage a second to nearby enemies. Each enemy hit restores 2 Mana to Rehgar. Lasts 5 seconds.

basic.name: Earthbind Totem (E)
basic.description: Create a totem that Slows nearby enemies by 35%. The totem has 260 Health and lasts for 6 seconds.

heroic.name: Ancestral Healing (R)
heroic.description: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1180 Health.

heroic.name: Shamanic ritual
heroic.description: {highlight}Creates a totem that will cast you current trait effect on all valid hero targets after 1 second. The effect will be recast after 4 seconds.{/highlight}

1.name: Purge (T)
1.description: When used on an allied Hero, make them Unstoppable for 0.5 seconds. When used on an enemy Hero, Slow them by 80%, decaying over 2 seconds.

1.name: Spirit link  (T)
1.description: {highlight}Use on an allied hero to share 25% of the damage received for 4 seconds.{/highlight}

1.name: Bloodlust (T)
1.description: {highlight}Grants an allied Hero{/highlight} 40% Attack Speed and 35% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 4 seconds.

4.name: Bloodlust Empowerment
4.description: {highlight}Rehgar will receive Bloodlust when casting Lightning Shield.{/highlight}

4.name: Electric Charge
4.description: The bearer of Lightning Shield Heals for 20% of the damage it deals to enemy Heroes, doubled if the bearer is Rehgar.While Lightning Shield is damaging an enemy, its bearer gains 10% increased Movement Speed.

4.name: Elemental Totem Empowerment
4.description: {highlight}Rehgar elemental totems will receive Lightning Shield.{/highlight}

7.name: Water Totem
7.description: {highlight}Reactivate earthbind totem to create a water totem that every 2 seconds, will cast Chain Heal at the nearest allied Hero with the lowest Health. This Chain Heal heals for 35% of its normal amount. Also increase allied heros healing received by 25%.{/highlight}

7.name: Fire Totem
7.description: {highlight}Reactivate earthbind totem to create a fire totem that will debuff enemies on area every 2 seconds reducing their Attack speed and spell power by 25% for 2 seconds. lasts 6 seconds{/highlight}.

7.name: Air Totem
7.description: {highlight}Reactivate earthbind totem to create a air totem that every 2 seconds, will pull the closes enemy hero nearby.{/highlight}

10.name: Ancestral Healing
10.description: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1180 Health.

10.name: Shamanic ritual
10.description: {highlight}Creates a totem that will cast you current trait effect on all valid hero targets after 1 second. The effect will be recast after 4 seconds.{/highlight}

13.name: Spirit waves
13.description: {highlight}Chain Heal will grant allied heroes unkillable for 1 second and will have its number of bounces increased by 2.{/highlight}

13.name: Earth Shield
13.description: Lightning Shield gives Heroes a Shield that absorbs damage equal to 14% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds. {highlight}If the shield is destroyed it renews the Lightning Shield duration and increases its size by 25%.{/highlight}

13.name: Feral Heart
13.description: {highlight}Ghost Wolf's Movement Speed bonus is increased to 30%. Ghost Wolf attacks against Heroes deal an additional 4% of the target's maximum Health and casts Lightning Shield on Rehgar.{/highlight}

16.name: Rising Storm
16.description: Every time a Lighting Shield damages an enemy Hero, increase its damage by 10%. Stacks up to 15 times.Passive: Increase the duration of Lightning Shield by 3 seconds.

16.name: Earthgrasp Totem
16.description: When Earthbind Totem is first cast, it deals 115 damage and Slows nearby enemies by 90% for 1 second.

16.name: Wind heal
16.description: Chain Heal empowers the next allied hero basic attacks making it hit twice.

20.name: Farseer's Blessing
20.description: {highlight}Ancestral Healing is cast a second time on the same target after 2.5 seconds and both healings are now a Perfect Heal meaning it can't be reduced.{/highlight}

20.name: Shamanic Master Training
20.description: {highlight}Increase the totem range by 35% and increase the number of reactivations to 2.{/highlight}

20.name: Totemic Mastery
20.description: {highlight}Your elemental totems will now last indefinitely and will have 100% increased health points. You will also be able to use all the elemental totems.{/highlight}

20.name: Pit Fighter
20.description: {highlight}When there's no nearby allied heroes close to Rehgar he receives 30 armor, increased 25% basic attack damage and spell power.{/highlight}
